entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @SenSchumer @RavMABAY The @WhiteHouse has known about #COVID19  since January and #Trump still doesn't have an adequate national strategy for dealing with *any* aspect of the #pandemic, not even the #Facts
